useCase.name: Add New PPoPCode Cases to Derivation Logic

mainSequence.step: Broker Team Member selects option to add PPoPCode cases
Broker UI sends a request to Validation Rules API to add new PPoPCode cases (00*****, 00FORGN)
Validation Rules API updates derivation rules
Integrate new PP codes into logic in Derivation Logic Module
Derivation Logic Module retrieves updated rules from Validation Rules DB
Validation Rules API receives confirmation of logic update
Validation Rules API displays a success message in Broker UI
Broker UI shows a confirmation of PPoPCode addition to the Broker Team Member
